Package Controllers

Class NavigationController

java.lang.Object
Controllers.NavigationController
public class NavigationController extends Object
Base navigation controller class using a Facade and Singleton Pattern that keeps track of the order in which navigation controller is called and instantiates each controller accordingly.
Since:
2022-10-25
Version:
1.0
Author:
Phee Kian Ann

    NavigationController singleton pattern instance.
    private final Stack<INavigation>

      NavigationController singleton pattern instance.

  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static NavigationController getInstance()
      Creates a new instance of NavigationController if there isn't one, else returns the old created instance.
      Returns:
      Instance of NavigationController singleton.

    • load

      public void load(INavigation navigation)
      Loads a new INavigation object, pushes it into the stack and runs the Start() method.
      Example: 
       
      NavigationController.getInstance().Load(new AdminController());
      Parameters:
      navigation - Takes in an object that implements INavigation interface
      See Also:
      • INavigation

    • goBack

      public void goBack(int... level)
      Pop the top level in the stack by given amount and Load the next controller.
      Parameters:
      level - (Optional) Given an int, decides the amount of controllers to pop from the stack.
